channel.title: Projects on Pine Island Technologies
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pine Island Technologies

item.title: Notifying "Perfect surf Conditions" in R
item.description: “You surf in Lake Michigan?!” Three years ago, I rented a board on a whim from a local shop. The 75 degree, clear late summer day reminded me of far away tropical places like Hawaii and Puerto Rico. I was hooked. Five surfboards, two wetsuits, and many many snowy surf session later, I wanted a way to predict and notify of surf, but better. Using real-time meteorological observations, I calculate and notify via SMS message when to surf in Lake Michigan.

item.title: Real Time Surf Notifications in R
